attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The builder who has a yard next door to me asked if he could go into my back garden to maintain his shed which ajoins my garden I agreed at the same time he was chopping down a large tree on his premises imagine my amazement to discover some months later that he had buried the tree in my back garden I believe some professional standards need to be set

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
